metadata.description: SkilledTradesBC, formerly Industry Training Authority, is the organization that advances British Columbia’s trades training system.

Skip to main content

[ Important Update: Exams, Registration and Certification Services Impacted by Job Action. Learn More. ](/exams-certification-distribution-impacted-bcgeu-job-action)

There has never been a better time to join the skilled trades. Together, we are building a world-class workforce in British Columbia and developing rewarding careers. 

[ Get to know SkilledTradesBC](/about-skilledtradesbc)

![sheet metal worker student writing at table](/sites/default/files/2023-03/skilledtradesbc-sheetmetalworker.jpg)

![man standing on ladder in building](/sites/default/files/2024-01/SKILLED%20TRADES_09072022_0014.jpg)

Skilled Trades Certification, also known as compulsory trades, aims to raise the profile of trades training in B.C., starting with the implementation of the first seven trades. 

[ Learn more about Skilled Trades Certification](/skilledtradescertification)

[ ![](/sites/default/files/2022-12/SKILLED%20TRADES_09082022_0124%20%281%29.jpg) Indigenous Peoples in Trades We work closely with Indigenous communities and training providers to make trades training accessible to rural and urban communities.  ](/indigenous-people-in-trades) [ ![](/sites/default/files/2022-12/Plumbers%201.jpg) Equity in the Trades We are helping to get more women and underrepresented groups in the trades, by telling their story and supporting key programs.  ](/equity-in-the-trades) [ ![](/sites/default/files/2023-02/youth-programs.jpg) Youth Programs Our Youth Trade Programs allow students to get started in a trade while they’re still in high school. ](/youth)

Sep 17, 2025

### National Truth and Reconciliation Day

National Day for Truth and Reconciliation is a day to honour the healing journeys of residential school survivors and their families and a time to engage in meaningful discussions about the history and legacy of the residential school system.

[ View More ](/national-truth-reconciliation-day) [View More](/national-truth-reconciliation-day)

Oct 01, 2025

### Important Update: Exams, Registration and Certification Services Impacted by Job Action

[ View More ](/exams-certification-distribution-impacted-bcgeu-job-action) [View More](/exams-certification-distribution-impacted-bcgeu-job-action)

![](/sites/default/files/2024-03/Miho%20Cropped.jpg)

Sep 17, 2025

### Miho Hind: Preparing For Technical Training

In 2024, we shared the inspirational story of Miho Hind – a newcomer and new mom who found a supportive community in her new career as a plumbing apprentice. We connected with her on the eve of her starting level 3 technical training to see how she is doing.

[ View More ](/miho-hind-preparing-technical-training) [View More](/miho-hind-preparing-technical-training)
